switch.text: Aim: Make b store the address stored in g (make b point to the same thing as g)

to make b point to
g, but only the local
copy of the pointer
changes

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 791px; margin-left: 952px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 21px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(153, 0, 153); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font:
Function dereferences
d to access the
original pointer b,
and then makes b
store the address
stored in g

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
